issue.title: shared_ptr is only contextually convertible to bool

discussion.p: N3920 made this edit, which is correct but unrelated to the support for arrays:

blockquote.p: Specializations of shared_ptr shall be CopyConstructible, CopyAssignable, and LessThanComparable, allowing their use in standard containers. Specializations of shared_ptr shall be contextually convertible to bool, allowing their use in boolean expressions and declarations in conditions. […]

discussion.p: That change is actually fixing a defect in the current wording and should be applied directly to the working paper, not just to the Library Fundamentals TS. The declarations of the conversion operator in and are explicit which contradicts the "convertible to bool" statement. The intention is definitely for shared_ptr to only be contextually convertible to bool.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N3936.

blockquote.p: -2- Specializations of shared_ptr shall be CopyConstructible, CopyAssignable, and LessThanComparable, allowing their use in standard containers. Specializations of shared_ptr shall be contextually convertible to bool, allowing their use in boolean expressions and declarations in conditions. The template parameter T of shared_ptr may be an incomplete type.
